Package neurons

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • neurons.Neuron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiasNeuron, InnerNeuron, InputNeuron, OutputNeuron
    public abstract class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simple abstract class decribing a Neuron in a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork, and has several subclasses with different Neurons.
    Author:
    OdinhengeT
    See Also:
    NeuralNetwork, NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork, Layer, BiasNeuron, InputNeuron, InnerNeuron, OutputNeuron

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Neuron​(int nbrLinks)
      Creates a new Neuron (Super constructor) with nbrLinks links with weights, stored in the double[] weights.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createWeights​(int nbrNeurons)
      Assigns a random value to each element in weights, following a Gaussian (normal) distribution of average 0.0 and standard deviation of 1.0.
      double getInput()
      Returns the last recieved input.
      int getNbrLinks()  
      abstract double getOutput()
      Returns the Neurons original output, without weights
      abstract double getOutputTo​(int index)
      Returns the Neurons output multiplied by the i:th weight, the output to the i:th neuron in the next layer.
      double getWeightTo​(int index)
      Returns the i:th elemnet in weights, the weight of the i:th link.
      void input​(double input)
      Gives the neuron a new input.
      void setWeights​(double[] deltaWeights)
      Sets the weights of this Neuron to the values provided in argument, deltaWeights .
      abstract java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the Neuron.
      void updateWeights​(double[] deltaWeights)
      Nugdes the weights of this Neuron by amounts provided in argument, deltaWeights.

    • Method Detail

      • createWeights

        public void createWeights​(int nbrNeurons)
        Assigns a random value to each element in weights, following a Gaussian (normal) distribution of average 0.0 and standard deviation of 1.0.
        Parameters:
        nbrNeurons - number of Neurons in the layer of this Neuron

        public int getNbrLinks()

      • getOutputTo

        public abstract double getOutputTo​(int index)
        Returns the Neurons output multiplied by the i:th weight, the output to the i:th neuron in the next layer.
        Parameters:
        index - index of element to return

      • getWeightTo

        public double getWeightTo​(int index)
        Returns the i:th elemnet in weights, the weight of the i:th link.
        Parameters:
        i - index of element to return

      • updateWeights

        public void updateWeights​(double[] deltaWeights)
        Nugdes the weights of this Neuron by amounts provided in argument, deltaWeights.
        Parameters:
        deltaWeights - double[] containing the nugdes for each weight
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if deltaWeights is of wrong length

      • setWeights

        public void setWeights​(double[] deltaWeights)
        Sets the weights of this Neuron to the values provided in argument, deltaWeights .
        Parameters:
        deltaWeights - double[] containing the new weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if deltaWeights is of wrong length
